Reviews.Title: Nice item
Reviews.Author: Teresa Fertitta
Reviews.Content: For 3yo grandson, who is fairly quick when it comes to electronics.I loaded up all the games that he plays on his mommy's iphone and had it all charged up for when he opened on Christmas day.Excellent for little ones who are just getting started on computer.

ProductInfo.Features:
5 Points Capacitive Touch Screen
Android 4.2 - Full Google Play Store - Tons of Apps to Download
Allwinner A13
CE Approved Including Accessories
Free Capacitive Stylus & Screen Protector
ProductInfo.Name: Christmas/Birthday Gift Onebook Genius 7" Android 4.1 4GB MID Capacitive Touch Screen Allwinner A13 Q88 Tablet WiFi External 3G MID
